Articles.Content:
Not to be rude or anything but in this topic i decided to discuss anything that is muslim related

from the Sunni (or Ahlus sunna wal jamaah) to Shia

and also discussing mahzab and such, and basically share our knowledge about islam

but please for the love of god don't bring hate to this

All i knew was that Imam Nawawi al Bantani was actually from Banten which was located in Java

how nice

@Mukita12, we're going to have to lock this as it's against rule 2.2b.  Religious and political discussion is not allowed on the forum as it has historically caused problems.  No matter how good your intent, these discussions have caused too many problems for us to continue to allow them.

Thank you for your understanding.
